sections.general: accountant highlights -soft skills: public speaking, public relations, team building, project management, procedure writing, staff supervision and management, ability to interface with professionals on all levels. accomplishments, honors, and activities -board of directors member for the food bank of corpus christi from november 2010 to april 2013. -held life insurance license -basketball official (referee) high school varsity level. accomplishments accomplishments, honors, and activities
